get.summary: Checks if the given mobile equipment is available to a specific ressource (room).

parameters.name: model.end
parameters.description: The desired end date of the booking.

parameters.name: model.equipmentId
parameters.description: The desired equipment id (GliederungId).

parameters.name: model.locationId
parameters.description: The id of the loction of the desired ressource.

parameters.name: model.start
parameters.description: The desired start date of the booking.

post.summary: Returns a list of available ressources filtered by the passed model.

get.summary:
Retrieves the free/busy data for a specified resource within a given time range,
and returns the availability information as a binary string, where '1' indicates a busy interval and '0' indicates a free interval.
The method calculates the total number of time intervals within the given time range based on the specified interval.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource for which free/busy data is requested.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date and time of the time range to check.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date and time of the time range to check.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The length of each time interval in minutes (default is 15 minutes).

get.summary:
Retrieves the free/busy data for the specified resources within a given time range,
and returns the availability information as a binary string, where '1' indicates a busy interval and '0' indicates a free interval.
The method calculates the total number of time intervals within the given time range based on the specified interval.

parameters.name: resourceIds
parameters.description: The ID's of the resources for which the free/busy data is requested.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date and time of the time range to check.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date and time of the time range to check.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The length of each time interval in minutes (default is 15 minutes).
